name: Nightmare Zombies
blurb: Nightmare Zombies is the first Oculus Rift Only immersive zombie simulator in the Post-Apocalypse urban environment of New York City.

rewards.reward: Zombie: Access to Website ID system for in-game content, Early Backers will recieve a limited Post-war Support Stamp, Including early Alpha Access
Survivor: a downloadable copy of the finished game for your PC and access to the Alpha, including Beta, plus will recieve a Post-war C.A.R.E Stamp
Armed Survivor: a downloadable copy of the finished game DRM free for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux + Digital Concept Art Book + Digital Survivor Tech Manual in armed combat.

Mercenary Survivor: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC with Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta

Mercenary Leader: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Digital Military map for the infected zone

Military Survivor: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Military ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Military map for the infected zone + Armed with military grade clothing, Emergency Zone Bag

Military Leader: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Military ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Military map for the infected zone + Armed with military grade clothing, Emergency Zone Bag

Military Technician: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Tech Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone Blue ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Military Tech ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Military map for the infected zone + Armed with military Tech clothing, Emergency Zone Bag + Military Tech Bag

Government Agent: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Tech Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone Gold ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Government ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Satellite map for the infected zone + Armed with Government clothing, Emergency Zone Case + Agent Case

Government Official: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Tech Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone Gold ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Political Government ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Satellite map for the infected zone + Politicial Government clothing, Emergency Zone Case Secure with Passcode and built in GPS

Government Technician: A digital copy of the finished game for your PC, Armed Forces Tech Military Grade Stamped Cleared Infected Zone Gold ID chip + Tech Manual in armed combat + Survivor C.A.R.E manual preventing infection + access to the Alpha and Beta + Political Government Tech ID Card (physical reward) + Digital Satellite map for the infected zone + Technician Government clothing, Emergency Zone Case Secure with Passcode and built in GPS + plus a cool 3D Printed Map of the infected zone
